description.en: Legal Block (LBK) is an electronic contract platform project built by lawyers. Legal Block aims to offer a contracting service that not only saves the procedure of a contract on the blockchain, but also provides legal services within the platform. Additionally, Legal Block has recently taken over FirmaChain, an electronic contract service platform that has been developing a decentralized data storage. Through this takeover, Legal Block boasts both technological and legal expertise in the field of electronic contracts.
